roleset.name: outstare

example.name: transitive
example.text: They tried [*] to outface him , but Joseph Simmons was as wide as two average men , and it [*EXP*-2]would have taken braver men than these were [*?*] [*] to outface him .

roleset.note: OUTFACE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'outface' based on sentences in brown. (from outface.01-v predicate notes)
